intro: Follow Jerry and Maya on a mystery-filled detective adventure!
description:
Unleash your inner detective in this exciting puzzle platforming adventure for kids and families! This interactive mystery game, based on the Swedish children's books with the same name, invites young detectives to solve crimes, uncover clues, and explore the quirky home town of the detectives.

Two Ways to Play:
• Single Player: Play as both Jerry and Maya, switching between them to solve mysteries solo.
• Co-op Mode: Play together with a friend! One of you plays as Jerry, and the other plays as Maya. Work together to solve mysteries.

Explore the Town and Put Your Detective Skills to the Test:
• Solve intriguing mysteries: Where’s the missing diamond? Who’s behind the stolen muffins?
• Navigate tricky platformer levels: Work individually or together to overcome clever obstacles and puzzles.
• Meet Valleby’s quirky residents: Each character brings their own unique stories and personalities.
• Find clues and uncover evidence: Interview suspects, gather information, and solve the crime!

With countless mystery combinations, this game offers a fun, replayable experience that blends entertainment with education.

Key Features:
• Single Player and Local Co-op Modes: Solve mysteries solo or with a friend.
• Engaging Puzzle Platforming Gameplay: A perfect mix of fun and critical thinking.
• Charming Art Style: Inspired by the beloved Swedish book series.
• Family-Friendly Fun: Suitable for all ages with wholesome content.
• Replayable Mysteries: Discover endless variations to keep the game fresh and exciting.

Are you ready to crack the case?
Download the game today and start your adventure!
